about_the_game:
PRESENTATION:


This is a classic 2D retro RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Ashes of Immortality and Fantasy Heroes.

FEATURES:


  • 15-20 hours of gameplay
  • Beautiful world with lush environments populated with unique creatures with their own cultures
  • Freedom to explore the whole world of Astra at your will
  • A touching story that speaks profoundly with the human soul
  • Sidequests to complete
  • A Hidden Boss to defeat
  • Ultimate Weapons to discover
  • Mouse Support
  • Quest Journal to aid in gameplay

SUMMARY:


"...at every new century, a new force threatens Astra, and a new God arises to defeat it. Such is the way of the world."

There are many worlds, and Astra is one of the most beautiful and powerful ones. Inhabited by many different beings, they live in harmony and peace, until a new century arrives...

Ethea is a young creature, descendant from the Gods, a Goddess herself, but still human, in a way. Such is her predicament, born with the destiny of defeating the forces that now threathen Astra, she doesn't have the Form and the powers of all her predecessors. However, she has something that any of them did not have. That "something" is what makes her more powerful than all of them together. What is it? That, is her quest, to find what it is that will allow her to save the world of Astra.

She is young and rebellious, and her journey is long and perillous. To walk her path righteously, she will need courage and maturity. Aided by her mentors, Ethea is on the path to change the ways of Astra and everyone in it, forever.
